attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ive applied for over a thousand jobs in 5 weeks,and ive only been offered 1 interview, companys should give every applicant a chance by interviewing all the applicants, to show what that applicant could offer, i would like the help of the government to get people back to work, or training to get eg..lgv licence or grant to buy car to get into work! if i had any of these i would be in work now.... please help

rejection.details:
Please be more specific about the action you are suggesting the government take, or alternatively, visit the Real Help Now website: 
http://realhelpnow.gov.uk
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
